summary: Relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to execute an agreement with the State of Washington Office of Superintendent of Public Instruction for a grant to support the department's Kidsplace Program; increasing the expenditure allowance of the department's 1998 budget; authorizing and ratifying certain expenditures; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
